title: Virtual laboratory-based chemical vapor deposition (CVD) process simulation course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic chemical process principles, statistics, and engineering science fundamentals
context.additional_context: An advanced program for current practitioners, focusing on strengthening experimental design and execution competencies in industry-simulated environments.

learning_goals: Apply principles of mass transfer and chemical reactions through CVD process simulation.
Interpret results using statistical analysis techniques on experimental data with noise.
Perform process variable optimization through an iterative experimental design process.
Propose process improvement plans based on simulation results in a 3D virtual environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
